name: @superflycss/foundation
description: Extensions / additions to normalize.css html element resets.

scripts.ig: npm i-g @superflycss/cli && npm install -g @jsdevtools/version-bump-prompt && npm install -g npm-check-updates && npm install -g npm-install-peers
scripts.p: bump patch && sfc dist && cd dist && npm publish

author: Ole Ersoy
